item.title: 富文本
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. Gist Simple Shortcode {{< gist spf13 7896402 "img.html" >}} Twitter Simple Shortcode {{< tweet GoHugoIO 1315233626070503424 >}} Vimeo Simple Shortcode {{< vimeo 146022717 >}} Youtube Simple Shortcode {{< youtube w7Ft2ymGmfc >}} Theme Custom Shortcodes These shortcodes are not Hugo
